con:interface.name: SmartBear Library
con:interface.con:description: Request data from our smartbear library

con:part.con:content: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"version":"0.1","title":"SmartBear Library","description":"Request data from our smartbear library"},"paths":{"/books":{"get":{"tags":["allUsers"],"summary":"searches books","description":"Returns array based on book search params.","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"query","name":"title","description":"title search parameter","required":false,"type":"string"},{"in":"query","name":"author","description":"author search parameter","required":false,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"book successfully created","schema":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/SMARTBEAR_APAC/sbLibDomain_APAC/1.0#/definitions/Book"}},"404":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/SMARTBEAR_APAC/sbLibDomain_APAC/1.0#/responses/404Response"}}}},"/books/{id}":{"get":{"tags":["allUsers"],"summary":"returns book object","description":"Returns array based of search params.","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"path","name":"id","description":"book id","required":true,"type":"integer"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"search results matching criteria","schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"status code","example":200},"result":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/SMARTBEAR_APAC/sbLibDomain_APAC/1.0#/definitions/Book"}}}},"404":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/SMARTBEAR_APAC/sbLibDomain_APAC/1.0#/responses/404Response"}}}},"/authors":{"get":{"tags":["allUsers"],"summary":"searches authors","description":"Returns array based on author search params.","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"query","name":"first_name","description":"first name search parameter","required":false,"type":"string"},{"in":"query","name":"last_name","description":"last name search parameter","required":false,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"book successfully created","schema":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/SMARTBEAR_APAC/sbLibDomain_APAC/1.0#/definitions/Author"}},"404":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/SMARTBEAR_APAC/sbLibDomain_APAC/1.0#/responses/404Response"}}}},"/authors/{id}":{"get":{"tags":["allUsers"],"summary":"returns author object","description":"Query for a specific author by ID.","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"path","name":"id","description":"book id","required":true,"type":"integer"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"search results matching criteria","schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"status code","example":200},"result":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/SMARTBEAR_APAC/sbLibDomain_APAC/1.0#/definitions/Author"}}}},"404":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/SMARTBEAR_APAC/sbLibDomain_APAC/1.0#/responses/404Response"}}}},"/subjects":{"get":{"tags":["allUsers"],"summary":"searches books","description":"Returns array based on book search params.","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"query","name":"title","description":"title search parameter","required":false,"type":"string"},{"in":"query","name":"author","description":"author search parameter","required":false,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"book successfully created","schema":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/SMARTBEAR_APAC/sbLibDomain_APAC/1.0#/definitions/Book"}},"404":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/SMARTBEAR_APAC/sbLibDomain_APAC/1.0#/responses/404Response"}}}}},"host":"virtserver.swaggerhub.com"}

{"definitions":{"Book":{"type":"object","required":["id","title","author","description","_link"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"integer"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Game of Thrones"},"description":{"type":"string"},"author":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Author"},"_link":{"type":"string","example":"/books/105"},"pub_date":{"type":"string","example":"10/15/1974"}}},"Books":{"type":"object","required":["status","results"],"properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","example":200},"results":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object"},"example":[{"id":"101","title":"A Game of Thrones","author_id":254,"_link":"/books/101"},{"id":"102","title":"A Clash of Kings","author_id":254,"_link":"/books/102"},{"id":"103","title":"A Storm of Swords","author_id":254,"_link":"/books/103"},{"id":"104","title":"A Feast for Crows","author_id":254,"_link":"/books/104"}]}}},"Author":{"type":"object","required":["id","first_name","last_name","_link"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"integer"},"first_name":{"type":"string"},"last_name":{"type":"string"},"_link":{"type":"string"}}},"Authors":{"type":"object","required":["status","results"],"properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","example":200},"results":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object"},"example":[{"id":"254","first_name":"George R.R.","last_name":"Martin","_link":"/authors/254"},{"id":"255","first_name":"Frank","last_name":"Herbert","_link":"/authors/255"},{"id":"256","first_name":"Andy","last_name":"Weir","_link":"/authors/256"}]}}}},"responses":{"404Response":{"description":"server error","schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"status code","example":404},"message":{"type":"string","description":"status string","example":"Resource on Swaggerhub"}}}}}}
